content: free pattern from hanjan crochet find a free step by step photo tutorial here 1 this blanket really is a classic that anyone can tackle all you need is a bunch of your favourite yarn colours - as many or as few as you like - and you re away using a simple pattern repeat this is the perfect beginner project to practise your gauge and technique the series will include blankets made with approximately 250g of double knit yarn using a 5mm/h hook the free download pattern has links to my blog for more hints and tips too so whether you want a therapeutic project to bust your yarn stash or are ready to start reading patterns and developing technique this is just the thing for you i am always available to help and love staying in contact with everyone - please share your work with me on facebook 2 or visit www hanjancrochet com 3 to find out what i m up to next enjoy hannah 1 https //wp me/p5pbyw-dh 2 http //www facebook com/hanjancrochet 3 http //www hanjancrochet com/blog/
